name: Seminar on Recent Advances in Science
description: Recent advances in the life, earth/space, and physical sciences. Three lecture hours a week for one semester.  May be repeated for credit when the topics vary. Prerequisite: For certified teachers, a bachelor's degree or consent of instructor; for others, six semester hours of coursework in science, in the biological sciences, in one of the physical sciences, or in one of the earth/space sciences, or consent of instructor.
